name: 透
text:
あった、ここに
ミニ扇風機
trans:
Found it here,
the mini fan.

name: 小糸
text:
か、勝手に触っちゃ
だめだよ……！
trans:
Yo──You shouldn't touch things like that
without asking first...!

name: 円香
text:
あっつ……
ここ、エアコンないの
trans:
It's so hot...
Is there no air conditioner here?

name: 円香
trans:
Not that, the wind from that thing
is unpleasantly warm.

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～……
色んなもの置いてあるね～
trans:
Mmm～...
There's all kinds of stuff stored here～

name: 小糸
text:
あ、雛菜ちゃんまで……！
あんまり触っちゃ────
trans:
Ah, even Hinana-chan...!
Don't mess around too much──

name: 透
text:
じゃじゃん
──『私、実は△△にハマっていました』

name: 透
text:
じゃ、小糸ちゃん
『私、実は円周率にハマっていました』
trans:
Well then, Koito-chan
"Actually, I was hooked on Pi"

name: 円香
text: 何ケタくらいまで言えるの？
trans: How many digits can you recite?

name: 透
text:
あはは、やばい
ひとよひとよにひとみごくうでしょ

name: 円香
text:
それルート２
覚え方も間違ってるし
trans:
That one's for square root of 2.
Even then you're remembering it wrong.

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜わかる～！
みひとつよひとついくにむいみ～～
trans:
Hinana knows this one～!
It's mihitotsuyohitotsuikunimuimi～～

name: 小糸
text:
と、透ちゃん
日本語だよ……

name: 透
trans: I wonder if there's another one like this.

name: 円香
text:
だから生ぬるい
やめて
trans:
As I said, the wind it produces is unpleasantly warm.
Drop it.

name: 灯織
trans:
Mano?
You are not going in?

name: めぐる
trans: What's wrong, you are not going in?

name: 小糸
trans: Give it a break and calm down...!

name: 真乃
text:
お邪魔します……
お掃除……ですか……っ
trans:
Sorry for interrupting...
Are you...cleaning up the room...?

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～
遊んでるだけですよ～？

name: 円香
text:
行こう
私たち、邪魔
trans:
Let's go.
We're getting in the way.

name: 真乃
text:
あっ、う、ううん……違うんです……っ
私たちが、後から来てるし……
trans:
Ah, u──umm...it's not like that...
We came here later anyway...

name: 灯織
text:
うん、ごめんなさい
ちょっと、しまったものを取りに来ただけで……
trans:
Yeah, please excuse us.
We just came to grab something we left here...

name: めぐる
text:
すぐだから、気にしないでねー！
えーと────
trans:
It shall be done in a moment, don't worry!
Let's see──

name: 灯織
trans:
Eh?
It must be here somewhere...

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～？
何か探してます～？
trans:
Hmm～?
What are you looking for～?

name: 真乃
text:
あっ、えっと……
どうしても必要なものじゃないんですけど
trans:
Ah──Um...
It's not something really necessary though.

name: 灯織
text:
また缶……
確かに、このへんは落ちてるのかも、ごみ
trans:
A can again...
It sure seems a lot of trash were dropped
around this area.

name: めぐる
text:
ふぅー！
結構夢中になっちゃうね、ごみ拾い……！
trans:
Fuuh!
It turns out we're actually quite into collecting
trash, aren't we?

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ
めぐるちゃん、いっぱい見つけててすごい……っ
trans:
Fufu
You've found so many, Meguru-chan, it's impressive...

name: 真乃
text: ……私、まだめぐるちゃんの半分くらいかな
trans:
I've collected...
probably about half as many as Meguru-chan has.

name: めぐる
text:
えへへっ
あっつーい！　集中力切れちゃうや！
trans:
Ehehe
It's so hot! I am going to lose my focus!

name: めぐる
text:
ふたりも扇風機回して回して！
はい、あー────
trans: Come, the two of you, take a spin at the fan!\nReady? Ah────

name: 真乃
text:
──あっ、見つけた
ビン、回収……っ

name: めぐる
text:
はいはーい
ビンはこっち！
trans:
Okie dokie.
Bring the bottle over here!

name: 真乃
text:
付き合ってくれて、
ありがとう……っ
trans:
Thank you...
for coming along with me to do this...

name: めぐる
text:
一緒にやりたいって言ったの、
わたしたちだよっ
trans:
It was us who said that we would like to do
this together.

name: 灯織
text:
『付き合ってる』なんて
思ってないから
trans:
Coming along with you,
that's not how we feel about this at all.

name: 真乃
text: やっぱり、ありがとう……っ

name: めぐる
text:
そしたらわたしもっ
ありがとう！
trans:
Then the same goes for us.
Thank you!

name: 灯織
text:
ありがとう、真乃
楽しいよ
trans:
Thanks, Mano
It's a lot of fun.

name: めぐる
text:
夏休みーって、
感じがする────
trans:
Summer break is upon us!
That's how it feels like──

name: 真乃
text:
──あのね……
他のみんなは、どうだと思う……？
trans:
──Erm...
then, how's it like for the others...?

name: 真乃
text:
プロデューサーさんが……
せっかくなら、事務所のみんなでやってみようって
trans:
Producer-san said...
if we're doing this, might as well let everyone
from the office take part in it.

name: 真乃
text:
ここの地域にもお世話になってるし
いいレクリエーションにもなるんじゃないかって
trans:
Since this area has helped us out a lot,
and it could be a good recreation for us.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、その……
みんなでやれたらとってもうれしいなって思うし──
trans:
I──I mean...
I would be really glad if everyone could do
this together──

name: 真乃
text:
みんなもきっと、
うんって言ってくれるって思うんだけど……
trans:
I think, everyone would sure say yes to this proposition,
however...

name: 真乃
text:
でも、暑いし、忙しいし……
我慢したり無理しちゃう人、いないかなって……
trans:
However, it's hot out here, plus everyone is busy...
I am worried if there are some who are putting up
with this and forcing themselves...

name: 真乃
text:
私が、勝手に始めたことなのに
その……────
trans:
This is something that I started of my own accord,
and yet...

name: めぐる
text:
誰かを迷わせたり困らせたりするために
やりたいわけじゃないもんねっ
trans:
I see, at the end of the day, we're not doing this in
order to lead somebody astray or bother someone.

name: 灯織
text:
確かに、こういうことって
ちょっと断りにくかったりするかもしれないし
trans:
Come to think about it, this kind of thing is
indeed a bit hard to turn down.

name: 灯織
text:
……
プロデューサーに言ってみよう
trans:
...
Go talk to Producer about this then.

name: 灯織
text: 私たちは、好きでやってるだけだから
trans:
After all,
we are doing this because we would love to.

name: めぐる
text:
うんうんっ
みんながわたしたちに付き合わなきゃってなるのはなしね！
trans:
Yeah yeah,
it shouldn't be us forcing everyone to come along!

name: 真乃
text:
ありがとう……
私たちって、言ってくれて────
